annotations.description: Hey! Before it gets too cold we thought you'd appreciate our favorite Rum drinks. Summer may be closing soon but it's still hot where we are and there's noth...
annotations.title: My Top 5 Favorite Rum Cocktails Of All Time!!!!

textContent:
1oz (30ml) Appleton Jamaica Rum
.75oz (22.5ml) Spiced Rum
.25oz (7.5ml) Jamaica Rum
6 Drops Tiki Bitters
3 Dashes Angostura Bitters 
1 Demerara Sugar Cube

Muddle sugar cube with bitters in rocks glass
Add spirits and stir with large rock
Garnish with orange peel

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0PHeH1UY-d8
title: Old Devil
